short_summary: The Parks Canada requires a contractor to plan and execute the Jasper Indigenous Exhibition's Grand Opening event to be held on September 6-8th, 2024.
description: The contractor will have a thrilling task to collabrate with the Indigenous Exhibit Working Group in a leadership role to organize and hold the event from concept to completion.It will involves meeting and event planning to hone the organizational skills to work within a team to ensure efficient service that lives up to the expectation in a stressful work environment.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Special Event Coordinator for Jasper Indigenous Exhibit Grand Opening**

Release Number: 5P420-23-0388
Closing Date: April 10, 2024, 4:00 PM MT
Source: Parks Canada

**Introduction**
Parks Canada is soliciting bids for the provision of Special Event Coordinator services to support the Grand Opening of the Jasper Indigenous Exhibit in Jasper National Park, Alberta. The contractor will work collaboratively with the Indigenous Exhibit Working Group to plan, coordinate, and deliver the event from concept to completion.

**Event Details**

* Date: September 6-8, 2024
* Location: Jasper National Park, Alberta

**Contract Duration**
The contract period is from the date of contract signing to November 1, 2024, inclusive.

**Set-Aside for Indigenous Business**
This procurement may be set aside for Indigenous Businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) as detailed in Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.

**Submission Requirements**
Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official. Due to technical issues with the SAP Ariba system, bidders must submit their bids via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document. Bids received in person or by courier will not be accepted.

Communication:
Email: soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca
Fax: 1-866-246-6893

**Legal Obligations**
The contractor must comply with all relevant laws, regulations, and ordinances set out in the National Park Act.

**Submission Documents**
Bid documents are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service website at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. Bidders should obtain documents from the official Government of Canada tendering service to ensure accuracy and completeness.

**Enquiries**
All technical and contractual enquiries should be directed to the Contracting Authority. Enquiries must be received no later than seven (7) calendar days prior to the tender closing date to allow sufficient time for response.

Parks Canada has made every effort to provide equivalent documents in both official languages, however, if discrepancies are found, please notify the contract officer listed in this opportunity as soon as possible to rectify the situation.
